creator: michael.c.small@gmail.com
text:
I'm deploying slide in JBoss 4.0.3RC2 and I'm attempting to the use the MySQL4.1
Adapter for the store.  If a create the tables in the MySQL and deploy slide in
JBoss, it works correctly (i.e. the store is initialized without problems).  If
I redeploy (with any combination of shutting down the server, etc.), I get the
following error during deployment:

16:10:02,644 INFO  [STDOUT] 06 Sep 2005 16:10:02 -
org.apache.slide.common.Namespace - INFO - Registering Store TasconlineSlideDS
(class org.apache.slide.store.ExtendedStore) with parameters {} on scope /
16:10:02,662 INFO  [STDOUT] 06 Sep 2005 16:10:02 -
org.apache.slide.common.Namespace - INFO - Initializing Store
TasconlineSlideDS(org.apache.slide.store.ExtendedStore)

been initialized, but I'm concerned about the error.
